item.title: Decoding Email Header and Contents
item.description: Using email.parser and email.policy along with policy.default means that you do not need to worry about character encoding as the modules will take care of it automatically. I forget where I saw it but I believe that policy.default will become the real default in the future. Current policy.compat32 is the module default.
